attributes.action: Social housing and benefits - do work
attributes.additional_details: Housing - I work have a huge mortgage. I know a family who do next to nothing. Have provided themselves 2 children out of choice. There newly built social housing will be ready next year. It is total inequality I am killing myself trying to pay mortgage - they are going to get the same house for nothing. They do not try they do not need to work why because the government looks after them. Make them do something such as litter pick all week to get their easy life - the Country is full of inequality!!!!
